title: The Noughties 2000-2009: A Decade that Changed the World
description: This book takes you through a decade of history in an informative and accessible way. From the spectre of global terrorism to the threat of global warming, from the crouching dragon of China to the growling bear of Russia, from the cult of Harry Potter to Simon Cowell's TV domination, the noughties were, for many, a decade that changed the world.
author: Tim Footman
